data.title: North Augusta High School Football Schedule For 2024 Season
data.meta_description: Check out the 2024 schedule for North Augusta High School Football Games, and catch all the action with WGAC!
data.text:
North Augusta High School 2024 Football Schedule

Welcome to North Augusta YellowJacket Football on WGAC!

Listen every Friday night for all the action, broadcast live as it happens on News Talk 95.1 FM, WGAC!

North Augusta YellowJackets 2024 Season Schedule

August 23 Thomson – Non-Region Away August 30 Lexington – Non-Region Home September 6 South Aiken Home September 13 Strom Thurmond – Non-Region Away September 20 Gilbert Away September 27 Gray Collegiate Academy Home October 3 Aiken Away October 11 South Aiken Home October 18 Airport Away October 25 Brookland-Cayce Home November 1 Midland Valley Home

Thanks to our sponsors! See all of them here!

“Cody” Blaine Jackson is one half of the Kicks Wake Up Krew on Kicks 99, and also serves as the Digital Program Director for Beasley Media Group in Augusta. She’s a Georgia native but currently resides just across the river in South Carolina. She started in the radio industry as a part-time board operator, and moved up through various roles, including on-air positions and program director for multiple stations. Her passions include fitness and anything to do with animals, as she has two fur babies, her dogs Harley and Waylon. Cody likes to write about pets, fitness and Augusta local events.
